title: Authorizes the commissioner of labor to implement rules and regulations regarding the removal of lead, asbestos and other hazardous waste
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of labor to implement rules and regulations regarding the removal of lead, asbestos, and other hazardous waste.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2413

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 20, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  PERKINS, BRESLIN, DILAN, DUANE, HASSELL-THOMPSON,
         KLEIN, KRUEGER, KRUGER,  MONTGOMERY,  OPPENHEIMER,  SAMPSON,  SERRANO,
         SMITH,  VALESKY -- read twice and ordered printed, and when printed to
         be committed to the Committee on Labor

       AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to  authorizing  the  commis-
         sioner  of  labor  to  implement  rules and regulations concerning the
         removal of lead, asbestos and other hazardous wastes

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  902  of the labor law is amended by adding a new
    2  subdivision 6 to read as follows:
    3    6. (A) THE COMMISSIONER SHALL ESTABLISH RULES AND REGULATIONS  REGARD-
    4  ING THE LICENSING AND CERTIFICATION OF THE REMOVAL OF LEAD, ASBESTOS AND
    5  OTHER  HAZARDOUS  MATERIALS. SUCH RULES AND REGULATIONS SHALL BE PROMUL-
    6  GATED ON OR BEFORE JANUARY FIRST NEXT SUCCEEDING THE EFFECTIVE  DATE  OF
    7  THIS SUBDIVISION.
    8    (B)  ANY  PERSON WHO HELD A VALID LICENSE OR CERTIFICATE REGARDING THE
    9  REMOVAL OF LEAD, ASBESTOS OR OTHER HAZARDOUS MATERIAL PRIOR  TO  JANUARY
   10  FIRST  IN  THE  YEAR  PRECEDING  THE EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS SUBDIVISION,
   11  SHALL NOT BE SUBJECT TO THE RULES AND REGULATIONS  ESTABLISHED  PURSUANT
   12  TO  PARAGRAPH (A) OF THIS SUBDIVISION, BUT SHALL CONTINUE TO BE GOVERNED
   13  BY ANY RULE OR REGULATION THAT WAS ESTABLISHED  PRIOR  TO  THE  DATE  OF
   14  PROMULGATION  OF  THE RULES AND REGULATIONS REQUIRED BY PARAGRAPH (A) OF
   15  THIS SUBDIVISION.
   16    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07802-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of labor to implement rules and regulations concerning the removal of lead, asbestos and other hazardous wastes
